testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: Set radius auth mode in AP Set backup2 radius server in AP Enable telnet in AP Create a user in radius server

step.desc: Set radius auth mode in AP Set backup2 radius server in AP Enable telnet in AP
step.console: -v "admin auth radius" -v "interface eth0 manage Telnet" -v "aaa radius-server backup2 ${pub.radius1.ip} shared-secret ${pub.radius1.sharesecret}" -v "exit"
